changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ticket ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, surname VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, bus_id INT, version BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT FK_BUS FOREIGN KEY (bus_id) REFERENCES bus (id) );

changeSet.author: wojtek
changeSet.sql: CREATE VIEW bus_view AS SELECT b.id, b.capacity, COUNT(t.id) AS number_of_tickets FROM bus b LEFT JOIN ticket t ON b.id = t.bus_id GROUP BY b.id;
